body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go             Places To Go          Ohio's National Park Service Sites  If you're in Ohio and you have a few days to spare after your visit to Charles Young Buffalo Soldiers NM, consider visiting Ohio's other national park sites.  Ohio has eight total National Park Service sites with three of them located within 100 minutes from Charles Young Buffalo Soldiers NM.  Learn more about Ohio's national parks and experience your national parks in Ohio!
title: Charles Young Buffalo Soldiers National Monument: Places To Go
